column1:
ECOG
#Inclusion
(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

(ecog[‘ecogdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(30) ) AND (ecog[‘ecogdate’] <= treatments['startdate'] + @DAYS(7) )

MIN(ABS(ecog[‘ecogdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

(ecog['ecogvalue'] == 0) OR (ecog['ecogvalue'] == 1)

maintenance_v2
#inclusion
(treatments['linenumber'] == 1) AND (treatments['maintenance'] == True)

(medication['drugname'] == 'Pemetrexed') OR (medication['drugname']== 'Bevacizumab') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'Erlotinib')

enhanced_advnsclcprogression['progressiondate'] >= treatments['startdate']

EGFR_drug
#exclusion
(treatments['linenumber']==1) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

(biomarkers['name'] == 'EGFR') AND (biomarkers['status']=='Mutation positive')

(biomarkers['specimencollecteddate'] < treatments['startdate']) 

(medication['drugname'] != 'Erlotinib') AND (medication['drugname'] != 'Gefitinib')

WBC
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'White Blood Cell Count'

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

(lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 2)

Neutrophils
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

(lab['name'] == 'Neutrophil count (absolute)') OR (lab['name'] == 'Granulocytes #') 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

((lab['name'] == 'Neutrophil count (absolute)') AND (lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 1.5)) OR ((lab['name'] == 'Granulocytes #') AND (lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 0.0015))

Platelets
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Platelet count' 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] - treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 100

Hemoglobin
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Hemoglobin, whole blood'

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] -treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] >= 9

AST_v2
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Aspartate aminotransferase (AST or SGOT)' 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] -treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] <= 1.5 * lab['maxnormcleaned']

ALT_v2
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Alanine aminotransferase (ALT or SGPT)' 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] -treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] <= 1.5 * lab['maxnormcleaned']

Bilirubin_v2
#inclusion

(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)

lab['name'] == 'Bilirubin (Total), serum' 

(lab[‘testdate’] >= treatments['startdate'] - @DAYS(28) ) AND (lab[‘testdate’] <= treatments['startdate'])

MIN(ABS(lab[‘testdate’] -treatments['startdate']))

lab['testresultcleaned'] <= lab['maxnormcleaned']

CNS_Metastasis
#exclusion
(treatments['linenumber']==2) AND (treatments['maintenance']==False)
diagnosis['diagnosisdate'] < treatments['startdate']
(diagnosis['code'] == '198.4' OR diagnosis['code'] == 'C79.4')

CYP3A4
#exclusion
(medication['drugname'] == 'ketoconazole') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'itraconazole') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'clarithromycin') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'atazanvir') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'indinavir') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'nefazodone') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'nelfinavir') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'ritonavir') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'saquinavir') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'teithromycin') OR (medication['drugname'] == 'voriconazole')
